description: Draft with llama → Critique with qwen3 → Improve with gpt

models.name: llama3.1:8b
models.system_prompt: Create an initial draft response to the question. Focus on getting the main ideas down.

models.name: qwen3:8b
models.system_prompt: Critically analyze the draft. Identify weaknesses, missing information, logical gaps, unclear explanations, and areas for improvement. Be thorough and constructive.

models.name: gpt-oss:20b
models.system_prompt: Based on the critique, create an improved final version that addresses all identified issues. Maintain strengths while fixing weaknesses.
